chunk:
Pacifica Kind Tint Tinted Serum, Teinte 02

Brand: Pacifica

Category: Foundation

Ingredients: aqua (eau), squalane, caprylic/capric triglyceride, stearyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, coco-caprylate, glyceryl stearate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, sodium hyaluronate, sr-hydrozoan polypeptide-1 (vegan collagen), ascorbic acid (vitamin C), citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) flower extract,

glyceryl stearate, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, sodium hyaluronate, sr-hydrozoan polypeptide-1 (vegan collagen), ascorbic acid (vitamin C), citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) flower extract, niacinamide, tocopherol (vitamin E), caffeine, jasminum officinale (jasmine) flower extract, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, xanthan gum,

citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) flower extract, niacinamide, tocopherol (vitamin E), caffeine, jasminum officinale (jasmine) flower extract, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate, xanthan gum, sodium phytate, lauroyl lysine, glycerin, citric acid, propanediol, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium benzoate. May Contain/Peut Contenir:

root ferment filtrate, xanthan gum, sodium phytate, lauroyl lysine, glycerin, citric acid, propanediol, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium benzoate. May Contain/Peut Contenir: titanium dioxide (CI77891), iron oxides (CI 77492, CI77491, CI 77499).
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
